trans-unit.source: Enables you to define which HTTP verbs are allowed when ASP.NET routing determines whether a URL matches a route.
The <xref:System.Web.Routing.HttpMethodConstraint> class enables you to limit route matching to certain HTTP verbs.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Routing.HttpMethodConstraint> 클래스를 사용 하면 경로 일치 특정 HTTP 동사를 제한할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify that a route is considered a match for a URL only when the HTTP verb for the request is `POST`.
trans-unit.target: 요청에 대 한 HTTP 동사는 경우에 경로 URL에 대 한 일치 하는 항목으로 간주 됩니다 지정할 수는 예를 들어 `POST`합니다.

trans-unit.source: To set constraints for route matching, you set the <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.Constraints%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route> class to an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary> class.
trans-unit.target: 경로 일치에 대 한 제약 조건을 설정 하려면 설정는 <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.Constraints%2A> 속성의는 <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route> 클래스의 인스턴스에 <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: To set an HTTP verb constraint, you set the value of one dictionary element to an <xref:System.Web.Routing.HttpMethodConstraint> object and the key to any name.
trans-unit.target: 하나의 사전 요소의 값을 설정 하는 HTTP 동사 제약을 설정 하려면 프로그램 <xref:System.Web.Routing.HttpMethodConstraint> 개체와 키를 임의의 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Web.Routing.HttpMethodConstraint.%23ctor%2A> method, you include all the HTTP verbs that are allowed for the route when ASP.NET routing determines whether the route matches a URL.
trans-unit.target: 에 <xref:System.Web.Routing.HttpMethodConstraint.%23ctor%2A> 메서드에, ASP.NET 라우팅에서 경로가 URL과 일치 하는지 여부를 확인할 때 경로 대해 허용 된 HTTP 동사를 모두 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route> object whose <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.Constraints%2A> property contains an item that has a key named `httpMethod` and that has a value that is an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Routing.HttpMethodConstraint> class.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제와 <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route> 개체 <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.Constraints%2A> 라는 키를 포함 하는 항목을 포함 하는 속성 `httpMethod` 올려진의 인스턴스가 하는 값은 <xref:System.Web.Routing.HttpMethodConstraint> 클래스.

trans-unit.source: The HTTP verbs that are valid for the route.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Routing.HttpMethodConstraint" /> class by using the HTTP verbs that are allowed for the route.

The following example shows a <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route> object whose <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.Constraints%2A> property contains an item that has a key named `httpMethod` and that has a value that is an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Routing.HttpMethodConstraint> class.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제와 <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route> 개체 <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.Constraints%2A> 라는 키를 포함 하는 항목을 포함 하는 속성 `httpMethod` 올려진의 인스턴스가 하는 값은 <xref:System.Web.Routing.HttpMethodConstraint> 클래스.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="allowedMethods" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
Gets the collection of allowed HTTP verbs for the route.
A collection of allowed HTTP verbs for the route.
trans-unit.target: 경로에 대해 허용된 HTTP 동사 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: An object that encapsulates information about the HTTP request.
The object that is being checked to determine whether it matches the URL.
The name of the parameter that is being checked.
An object that contains the parameters for a route.
An object that indicates whether the constraint check is being performed when an incoming request is processed or when a URL is generated.
Determines whether the request was made with an HTTP verb that is one of the allowed verbs for the route.
When ASP.NET routing is processing a request, <see langword="true" /> if the request was made by using an allowed HTTP verb; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
When ASP.NET routing is constructing a URL, <see langword="true" /> if the supplied values contain an HTTP verb that matches one of the allowed HTTP verbs; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The default is <see langword="true" />.
One or more of the following parameters is <see langword="null" />: <paramref name="httpContext" />, <paramref name="route" />, <paramref name="parameterName" />, or <paramref name="values" />.
An object that encapsulates information about the HTTP request.
The object that is being checked to determine whether it matches the URL.
The name of the parameter that is being checked.
An object that contains the parameters for a route.
An object that indicates whether the constraint check is being performed when an incoming request is handled or when a URL is generated.

For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Web.Routing.IRouteConstraint.Match(System.Web.HttpContextBase,System.Web.Routing.Route,System.String,System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary,System.Web.Routing.RouteDirection)" />.
<see langword="true" /> if the request was made by using an allowed HTTP verb; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The default is <see langword="true" />.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현이며,

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.Routing.HttpMethodConstraint> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.Routing.IRouteConstraint> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Routing.HttpMethodConstraint> 인스턴스가 <xref:System.Web.Routing.IRouteConstraint> 인터페이스로 캐스팅된 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: One or more of the following parameters is <see langword="null" />: <paramref name="httpContext" />, <paramref name="route" />, <paramref name="parameterName" />, or <paramref name="values" />.
